short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safe browsing for Kids! Filters content in real time using an advance predictive system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KidSecure is your family's digital guardian, ensuring a safe online environment for your children. Harnessing the power of advanced Naive Bayes and Named Entity Recognition algorithms, KidSecure keeps your kids protected while they explore the web.

Key Features:
• Real-time Content Filtering: KidSecure uses an advance filtering system to instantly identify and block unsafe content, providing real-time protection for your children.
• Customizable Settings: Tailor the level of safeguarding to match your family's unique needs. KidSecure offers flexible settings for a personalized browsing experience.
• User-Friendly Interface: KidSecure's intuitive interface makes it effortless for parents to set up the extension, ensuring peace of mind.
• Privacy and Security: Your family's privacy is of utmost importance. KidSecure collects minimal data necessary for functionality and never shares it with third parties.
• Regular Updates: Count on KidSecure for ongoing updates to maintain robust security and keep up with evolving online threats.

Stay worry-free with "KidSecure" your child's online safety partner!
